p: Statistical analysis was performed using GraphPad Prism software (La Jolla, California, USA). Comparisons across groups were made using 1-way or 2-way ANOVA and paired comparisons were determined using the non-parametric Mann-Whitney test. Data are expressed as means Â± SEM. * p< 0.05; ** p< 0.01 and *** p<0.001 are indicated in Figures.
